security.title: Security
security.intro: We take security seriously. Here's how we protect your data and maintain the highest security standards.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All your data is encrypted both in transit and at rest using industry-standard encryption protocols.

access.title: Access Controls
access.description: We implement strict access controls and multi-factor authentication to protect your account.

monitoring.title: Security Monitoring
monitoring.description: Our systems are continuously monitored for suspicious activity and potential security threats.

compliance.title: Compliance & Standards
compliance.description: We follow industry best practices and comply with international security standards including GDPR and SOC 2.
